snippet: Elizabeth Taylor appears in just one snapshot in Jess Walter’s “Beautiful Ruins,” but the repercussions of her erratic behavior change the lives of the novel’s characters.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Beautiful Ruins by Jess Walter.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth Taylor appears in just one snapshot in Jess Walter’s “Beautiful Ruins,” but the repercussions of her erratic behavior change the lives of the novel’s characters.

headline.main: Elizabeth Taylor Never Visited This Italian Cliff
headline.print_headline: Elizabeth Taylor Never Visited This Italian Cliff
